content.title:
Work with
Powerful Features
content.text: Livingdocs is built to make you more productive. Our set of features empowers you to create exactly the project you need.

content.title: Collaboration at the Core
content.text1: Visually keep track of every change in your documents and easily go back and forth in your editing history.
content.text2: Discuss with your fellow writers how to best come up with the content you need, write comments, build discussion threads and resolve conversations as you go.

content.title: Workflows
content.text: Organize workflows from proofreading to translations in kanban boards and always see what needs to be done next.

content.title: Realtime collaboration
content.text: Always see who is editing the same document with you and easily exchange the lead.

content.title: Lock
content.text: Sometimes you want to edit alone. The lock plugin allows you to set time-limited locks on a document where only you can edit.

content.title: Layouts & Rules at Your Control
content.text1: The Livingdocs building blocks technology allows you to build beautiful layouts and freely arrange content and teasers on them using drag and drop.
content.text2: Build whole newspaper front site with powerful automation that decides what teaser goes where and the ability to manually set focus where you need to.

content.title: Scheduled sites
content.text: Schedule content publication dates as well as automation rules to fully schedule a page. Great if you want to take the weekend off and let your pages run itself.

content.title: Menus
content.text: Intuitively build site navigations using drag and drop.

content.title: Multi-Language
content.text: Offer your pages and content in multiple languages and setup translation workflows where necessary.

content.title: Smarter Assets Than Ever Before
content.title1: Smarter work thanks to machine learning
content.text1: Use our media library to quickly access images that have been auto-tagged with Googleâ€™s powerful Vision machine learning algorithms.
content.text2: Livingdocs uses modern storage, search and delivery technology and easily scales to millions of assets. We deliver images directly to your customers over our highly available CDNs.

content.title: Inline image editing
content.text: Easily crop images from within documents and define different aspect ratios for optimal presentation on every device.

content.title: Work with web assets
content.text: Embed Tweets, Videos, Instagram and more easily inline and arrange them on your documents.

content.title: Fully Organized Content
content.text1: Use the power of customizable dashboards to give entry points to every possible user group, be it writers, proofreaders or editors-in-chief. Present content on your dashboards in lists, visual layouts or kanban boards.

content.title: Elastic Search
content.text: Use our powerful ElasticSearch based search engine to find content and enable our Natural Language Processing module to automatically tag all content.

content.title: Filters
content.text: Use our predefined filters or create new ones for your use cases and organize filters in bookmarks for fast access.

content.title: Scalability Made Easy
content.text1: Livingdocs was built to scale from day 1. We support multi-project setups and can run hundreds of publications on one instance for our customers delivering to thousands of channels.

content.title: Scales horizontally in the cloud
content.text:
â€“ Thousands of concurrent writers
â€“ Millions of documents
â€“ Terrabytes of traffic in high-availability setups

content.title: Loved by Developers and Designers
content.text1: Use our unique design editor to create Livingdocs building block sets from scratch and define what your editorial users can work with.
content.text2: Define every possible combination of structured data, stand-alone or assigned to documents. Editors can fill out your defined properties, write documents and our APIs offer all the content for you to work with in your frontends.

content.title: All Javascript
content.text: We are Javascript from front to back and offer you our rendering technology open-source via our Node SDK.

content.title: Cloud-ready
content.text: We offer docker setups for Google Cloud Platform, Amazon AWS and Digital Ocean. Of course you can also just take our docker images and build your own infrastructure.

content.title: API power
content.text: We run with ElasticSearch and its powerful search APIs as well as offering event-based notifications.

content.title: Admins love it
content.text: Define roles and access rights for your user groups and easily manage users through our powerful administration backends.

content.title: Â«Itâ€™s not where you take things from â€“ itâ€™s where you take them to.Â» â€“ Jean-Luc Godard
content.text:
The Livingdocs Ecosystem enables media companies to succeed in their digital transformation. We built in a collection of best-of-breed modules in order to satisfy the whole lifecycle of a news publication.

- Planning, DeskNet
- Machine Learning, iMatrics and Google Vision
- Print, WoodWing Enterprise
- Interactives and Graphics, NZZ Q
- Video, Brightcove
- Push Notifications, Google Firebase and e-thinking
- Feed management, alephDAM
- DAM / E-Paper, huGO+
